@package glados-vm
@version 0.1.0.0

module Types
data Value
IntVal :: Int -> Value
FloatVal :: Float -> Value
BoolVal :: Bool -> Value
CharVal :: Char -> Value
StringVal :: String -> Value
ListVal :: [Value] -> Value
SymbolVal :: String -> Value
NilVal :: Value
FunctionVal :: Int -> Value
TupleVal :: [Value] -> Value
ArrayVal :: [Value] -> Value
StructVal :: [(String, Value)] -> Value
MapVal :: [(Value, Value)] -> Value
data Instruction
PushConst :: Int -> Instruction
PushInt :: Int -> Instruction
PushFloat :: Float -> Instruction
PushBool :: Bool -> Instruction
PushString :: String -> Instruction
PushNil :: Instruction
Pop :: Instruction
Add :: Instruction
Sub :: Instruction
Mul :: Instruction
Div :: Instruction
Mod :: Instruction
Neg :: Instruction
Eq :: Instruction
Neq :: Instruction
Lt :: Instruction
Gt :: Instruction
Le :: Instruction
Ge :: Instruction
Cons :: Instruction
Head :: Instruction
Tail :: Instruction
ListMake :: Int -> Instruction
Len :: Instruction
MakeSymbol :: Instruction
Quote :: Instruction
Eval :: Instruction
Load :: String -> Instruction
Store :: String -> Instruction
Define :: String -> Instruction
Jump :: Int -> Instruction
JumpIfTrue :: Int -> Instruction
JumpIfFalse :: Int -> Instruction
Call :: Int -> Int -> Instruction
Return :: Instruction
Closure :: Int -> Instruction
LoadArg :: Int -> Instruction
Print :: Instruction
Input :: Instruction
MakeTuple :: Int -> Instruction
TupleGet :: Int -> Instruction
MakeArray :: Int -> Instruction
ArrayGet :: Instruction
ArraySet :: Instruction
MakeMap :: Int -> Instruction
MapGet :: Instruction
MapSet :: Instruction
MakeStruct :: Int -> Instruction
StructGet :: String -> Instruction
StructSet :: String -> Instruction
Halt :: Instruction
data Header
Header :: Int -> Int -> Int -> Header
[magic] :: Header -> Int
[version] :: Header -> Int
[flags] :: Header -> Int
data FunctionMeta
FunctionMeta :: Int -> Int -> Int -> FunctionMeta
[funcId] :: FunctionMeta -> Int
[funcAddress] :: FunctionMeta -> Int
[funcArgCount] :: FunctionMeta -> Int
data BytecodeFile
BytecodeFile :: Header -> [Value] -> [FunctionMeta] -> [Instruction] -> BytecodeFile
[header] :: BytecodeFile -> Header
[constants] :: BytecodeFile -> [Value]
[functions] :: BytecodeFile -> [FunctionMeta]
[instructions] :: BytecodeFile -> [Instruction]
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Types.BytecodeFile
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Types.FunctionMeta
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Types.Header
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Types.Instruction
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Types.Value
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Types.BytecodeFile
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Types.FunctionMeta
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Types.Header
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Types.Instruction
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Types.Value

module Execution.State
data VMState
VMState :: [Value] -> Map String Value -> Int -> [(Int, [Value])] -> [Value] -> Bool -> [Instruction] -> [Value] -> [FunctionMeta] -> VMState
[stack] :: VMState -> [Value]
[env] :: VMState -> Map String Value
[ip] :: VMState -> Int
[callStack] :: VMState -> [(Int, [Value])]
[curArgs] :: VMState -> [Value]
[isRunning] :: VMState -> Bool
[instructions] :: VMState -> [Instruction]
[constants] :: VMState -> [Value]
[functions] :: VMState -> [FunctionMeta]
newVMState :: [Instruction] -> [Value] -> [FunctionMeta] -> VMState
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Execution.State.VMState

module Execution.Ops.VariableManagement
opLoad :: String -> VMState -> Either String VMState
opStore :: String -> VMState -> Either String VMState

module Execution.Ops.FunctionManagement

module Execution.Loop
execLoop :: VMState -> IO ()

module Utils

module Parser
parseBytecode :: Get BytecodeFile
parseHeader :: Get Header
parseConstantPool :: Get [Value]
parseConstantEntry :: Get Value
parseFunctionTable :: Get [FunctionMeta]

parseInstructions :: [Value] -> Get [Instruction]
